title: The Three-Body Problem
author: Liu Cixin
summary: First novel in Remembrance of Earth's Past trilogy exploring alien contact.

title: Jane Eyre
author: Charlotte Bronte
summary: An orphaned governess confronts morality, love, and independence.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
summary: Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy navigate pride and social expectations.

title: The English Patient
author: Michael Ondaatje
summary: Four strangers confront memory and loss in a WWII villa.

title: Small Gods
author: Terry Pratchett
summary: God Om returns as a tortoise; Brutha confronts belief and empire.
